text: yihamte kupharai karae, sihamtara babe allahe nuhara strai arau lutara straira udaharana diche; sihamta amara bandasakalara majara dujana sat bandara adhinata achila, kintu sihamta ubhaye te'omlokara lagata bisbasaghatakata karaichila. Phalata allahara sastira paraa raksa karaibalai nuha arau luta sihamtara kono kamata nahila, arau sihamtaka koraa ha’la, ‘tomaloka ubhaye praraesakaraisakalara lagata jahannamata praraesa karaa’
